body_html:
Hello,

Thanks for answering on such a short notice.
I tried to follow the steps you recommended, but build_libtorch.py is missing. Below you can find the content of tools/ :
amd_build aten_mirror.sh autograd build_pytorch_libs.bat build_pytorch_libs.sh clang_tidy.py convert.vim cpp_build cwrap docker download_mnist.py gen_onnx.sh jit nnwrap pytorch.version setup_helpers shared test_aten_install.sh __init__.py __pycache__

Are there any new changes that I should pull?
Also, I want to mention that I have a DLL named "torch.dll" and torch/torch.h is resolved correctly.

Kind regards,
Sorina

body:
Hello, 

Thanks for answering on such a short notice. 
I tried to follow the steps you recommended, but build_libtorch.py is missing. Below you can find the content of tools/ :
`
amd_build
aten_mirror.sh
autograd
build_pytorch_libs.bat
build_pytorch_libs.sh
clang_tidy.py
convert.vim
cpp_build
cwrap
docker
download_mnist.py
gen_onnx.sh
jit
nnwrap
pytorch.version
setup_helpers
shared
test_aten_install.sh
__init__.py
__pycache__
`

Are there any new changes that I should pull?
Also, I want to mention that I have a DLL named "torch.dll" and torch/torch.h is resolved correctly.

Kind regards,
Sorina
